tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
I came to know about Dr Mallesh through my office colleague. His shop is located near Hosakerehalli cross (1st floor). 

He is super friendly to talk to and explained clearly what was the issue with my mother's teeth, she had root infection across multiple front teeth. He suggested apicoectomy surgery which was completed after root canal. He also helped us in choosing the right crown since a colour mismatch can be detrimental to the looks. All the appointments were done through phone and he was okay to reschedule a couple of times when we couldn't make it due to office meetings. I have recommended him to all my family and friends. 

~Vinay T M

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Most patient and professional person I've ever met. My treatment went really well, I would highly recommend this clinic to anybody with dental issues.

review: The doctor was exceptionally patient and thorough during my wife’s root canal treatment. They took the time to explain everything clearly, address all our concerns, and ensure we understood the procedure. Their friendly and professional approach made the experience much more comfortable.

review: I visited Dr Mallesh dental zone for my dental checkup. I was suffering from tooth pain and sensitivity for many days and I was not able to identify which tooth was causing it. With patience, the doctor examined and explained the cause of the pain and the necessary treatment. Dr. Mallesh is experienced yet friendly, and calmly listens to patients' problems. The clinic is well maintained. I recommend Dr. Mallesh to my friends and family.
